00017 void  DirectXZeroMem ( void* pMemory, int nSize )
00018 {
00019       memset ( pMemory, 0, nSize );
00020 }

00023 void DirectXAttempt ( INT32 iErrorCode, INT32 nLine, char *szFilename )
00024 {
00025 #ifdef _DEBUG
00026       if ( iErrorCode != DD_OK )
00027       {
00028             FastDebugMsg("DIRECTX COMMON: DirectX Error\n" );
00029     FastDebugMsg(DirectXErrorDescription(iErrorCode));
00030       }
00031 #endif
00032 }
00033 
00034 char* DirectXErrorDescription ( INT32 iDXReturn )
00035 {
00036     switch( iDXReturn ) 
00037     {
00038       case DD_OK
00039       : return "No error.\0";
00040       case DDERR_ALREADYINITIALIZED 
00041       : return "The object has already been initialized.";
00042       case DDERR_BLTFASTCANTCLIP 
00043       : return "A DirectDrawClipper object is attached to a source surface that has passed into a call to the IDirectDrawSurface2::BltFast method.";
00044       case DDERR_CANNOTATTACHSURFACE 
00045       : return "A surface cannot be attached to another requested surface.";
00046       case DDERR_CANNOTDETACHSURFACE 
00047       : return "A surface cannot be detached from another requested surface.";
00048       case DDERR_CANTCREATEDC 
00049       : return "Windows cannot create any more device contexts (DCs).";
00050       case DDERR_CANTDUPLICATE 
00051       : return "Primary and 3D surfaces, or surfaces that are implicitly created, cannot be duplicated.";
00052       case DDERR_CANTLOCKSURFACE 
00053       : return "Access to this surface is refused because an attempt was made to lock the primary surface without DCI support.";
00054       case DDERR_CANTPAGELOCK 
00055       : return "An attempt to page lock a surface failed. Page lock will not work on a display-memory surface or an emulated primary surface.";
00056       case DDERR_CANTPAGEUNLOCK 
00057       : return "An attempt to page unlock a surface failed. Page unlock will not work on a display-memory surface or an emulated primary surface.";
00058       case DDERR_CLIPPERISUSINGHWND 
00059       : return "An attempt was made to set a clip list for a DirectDrawClipper object that is already monitoring a window handle.";
00060       case DDERR_COLORKEYNOTSET 
00061       : return "No source color key is specified for this operation.";
00062       case DDERR_CURRENTLYNOTAVAIL 
00063       : return "No support is currently available.";
00064       case DDERR_DCALREADYCREATED 
00065       : return "A device context (DC) has already been returned for this surface. Only one DC can be retrieved for each surface.";
00066       case DDERR_DIRECTDRAWALREADYCREATED 
00067       : return "A DirectDraw object representing this driver has already been created for this process.";
00068       case DDERR_EXCEPTION 
00069       : return "An exception was encountered while performing the requested operation.";
00070       case DDERR_EXCLUSIVEMODEALREADYSET 
00071       : return "An attempt was made to set the cooperative level when it was already set to exclusive.";
00072       case DDERR_GENERIC 
00073       : return "There is an undefined error condition.";
00074       case DDERR_HEIGHTALIGN 
00075       : return "The height of the provided rectangle is not a multiple of the required alignment.";
00076       case DDERR_HWNDALREADYSET 
00077       : return "The DirectDraw cooperative level window handle has already been set. It cannot be reset while the process has surfaces or palettes created.";

00079       : return "DirectDraw is prevented from restoring state because the DirectDraw cooperative level window handle has been subclassed.";
00080       case DDERR_IMPLICITLYCREATED 
00081       : return "The surface cannot be restored because it is an implicitly created surface.";
00082       case DDERR_INCOMPATIBLEPRIMARY 
00083       : return "The primary surface creation request does not match with the existing primary surface.";
00084       case DDERR_INVALIDCAPS 
00085       : return "One or more of the capability bits passed to the callback function are incorrect.";
00086       case DDERR_INVALIDCLIPLIST 
00087       : return "DirectDraw does not support the provided clip list.";
00088       case DDERR_INVALIDDIRECTDRAWGUID 
00089       : return "The globally unique identifier (GUID) passed to the DirectDrawCreate function is not a valid DirectDraw driver identifier.";
